    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sighting Shot](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2057)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 82 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 72 gp

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Eyes are carved onto a _sighting shot_. When you Activate the ammunition, it glows, shedding [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407) for 20 feet and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) for 20 feet beyond that. If you shot the activated ammunition, your mind swirls with images of what the _sighting shot_ passed and hit as if you sprinted along the ammunition's course. You see this path as if with your normal visual senses. Once a _sighting shot_ hits anything or reaches its maximum range, it stops transmitting images to you. A _sighting shot's_ light is visible to creatures who didn't Activate the ammunition, but they receive no special information from it.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
